name: Switch Software Solutions
description:
We are Switch - your collaborative Software Development partner for front-end, back-end, and mobile development. Based in Austin, TX with a development center in Montevideo, Uruguay (just +1 hour ahead of ET) - we excel in efficiently scaling up the software development capacity of global enterprises such as BBVA Bank, Sodexo, and Verifone. 
Since 2009, we have focused on Java, .NET, JavaScript, SQL, C# and Ruby on Rails - as well as mobile platforms (iOS and Android). Our services include front-end development, back-end development, quality assurance (QA), and user interface (UI) design.
Our transparent collaboration model provides you the cost-effectiveness to increase your profitability - without communication challenges or quality problems often associated with software development outsourcing.
